title: xproto 7.0.31 now recognizes Cray ARM
body:
Use patch file to update `build/spack-src/config.guess, config.sub`

The xproto configuration files `config.guess`, `config.sub` were too old to recognize Cray ARM

```
              previous:                      updated:
config.guess: timestamp='2006-02-23'   ==>   timestamp='2019-06-10'
config.sub:   timestamp='2006-02-23'   ==>   timestamp='2019-06-30'

```
**LANL HPC Capulin**
```
$ echo $HOSTNAME
cp-loginy
$ uname -a
Linux nid00007 4.12.14-25.22_5.0.70-cray_ari_c #1 SMP Tue Mar 5 00:08:48 UTC 2019 (bc16c54) aarch64 aarch64 aarch64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:	SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 15

```
**Before patch: configuration fails**
```
dantopa@nid00006:xproto $ spack install xproto % cce@9.0.1
==> Installing xproto
...
==> Executing phase: 'configure'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    '/users/dantopa/.spack/stage/xproto-7.0.31-ncrn2glmlyxtt5zxdrgz73kkidpbykl5/spack-src/configure' '--prefix=/pfs/scratch4/yellow/.mdt2/dantopa/repos/spack/pr/pr-config.spack/opt/spack/cray-cnl7-arm_thunderx2/cce-9.0.1/xproto-7.0.31-ncrn2glmlyxtt5zxdrgz73kkidpbykl5'

1 error found in build log:
     74    /usr/convex/getsysinfo =
     75
     76    UNAME_MACHINE = aarch64
     77    UNAME_RELEASE = 4.12.14-25.22_5.0.70-cray_ari_c
     78    UNAME_SYSTEM  = Linux
     79    UNAME_VERSION = #1 SMP Tue Mar 5 00:08:48 UTC 2019 (bc16c54)
  >> 80    configure: error: cannot guess build type; you must specify one
```

**After patch: configuration succeeds**
```
dantopa@nid00006:xproto $ spack install xproto % cce @ 9.0.1
...
==> Executing phase: 'configure'
==> Executing phase: 'build'
==> Executing phase: 'install'
==> Successfully installed xproto
  Fetch: 0.01s.  Build: 17.90s.  Total: 17.91s.
[+] /pfs/scratch4/yellow/.mdt2/dantopa/repos/spack/pr/pr-config.spack/opt/spack/cray-cnl7-arm_thunderx2/cce-9.0.1/xproto-7.0.31-fo3xw5zla7nrpzooayboquxiuc445z2y
```
**Confirmation**
```
dantopa@nid00006:xproto $ spack find -ldf xproto@7.0.31
==> 1 installed package
-- cray-cnl7-arm_thunderx2 / cce@9.0.1 --------------------------
fo3xw5z xproto@7.0.31%cce

```
Signed-off-by: Daniel Topa <dantopa@lanl.gov>
Tue Sep 17 16:27:54 MDT 2019
